fullplot: On a beautiful college campus, something ugly is about to be spread around. A bit of gossip that was told is starting to take a frightening turn. Who could it have offended and how far will the person on the other side of the gossip handle the embarrassing situation.
plot: Three college students base their class project around gossip and how fast it spreads, which soon spirals out of control.
title: Gossip

tomatoes.consensus: Gossip drags on far beyond its entertainment value.
